parametersDescriptions.badgeContent: The content rendered within the badge.
parametersDescriptions.showZero: Controls whether the badge is hidden when badgeContent is zero.

returnValueDescriptions.badgeContent: Defines the content that's displayed inside the badge.
returnValueDescriptions.displayValue: Value to be displayed in the badge. If badgeContent is greater than max, it will return max+.
returnValueDescriptions.invisible: If true, the component will not be visible.
returnValueDescriptions.max: Maximum number to be displayed in the badge.
